content: If the whole trend is getting theories out of cats, I think sitting in a circle would be this; Always get involved in systems or communities. Why? To eliminate confusion and indecision. With certain concept and schemas, one is able to keep progression and behave without hesitations. However, it also reveals the fact that veritas is still distant from us living creatures. (I don’t believe in any religion, but searching for the veritas is my motivation. Regarding to my in the circle theory — they’re the same case.)
